sources.title: The Big Country (1958) Gregory Peck · Jean Simmons
sources.description: From legendary director William Wyler comes this Western, the story of a ship's captain ( Gregory Peck ) who encounters jealousy, hatred, and rivalries in the West. Burl Ives won an Oscar® for his role...

metadata.Plot: Retired, wealthy sea Captain James McKay arrives in the vast expanse of the West to marry fiancée Pat Terrill. McKay is a man whose values and approach to life are a mystery to the ranchers and ranch foreman Steve Leech takes an immediate dislike to him. Pat is spoiled, selfish and controlled by her wealthy father, Major Henry Terrill. The Major is involved in a ruthless land war, over watering rights for cattle, with a rough hewn clan led by Rufus Hannassey. The land in question is owned by Julie Maragon and both Terrill and Hannassey want it.
metadata.Writer: James R. Webb, Sy Bartlett, Robert Wilder
metadata.Actors: Gregory Peck, Jean Simmons, Carroll Baker
